Install Updatable Select Dropdown add-on like any other ExpressionEngine 2 add-on. 

Simply drag the cstslct/ folder found in your download into the system/expressionengine/third_party/ folder. 

Then go into the EE control panel, navigate to the Fieldtypes page and find Updatable Select Dropdown in the list.

Click the install link and you’ve installed Updatable Select Dropdown Fieldtype!


NOTE

If you want to make this field is required (in control panel), there is need to have at least one option in dropdown, not empty
